# UnitSpecifier enumeration

Specifies the physical pixel unit specifier.

```csharp
public enum UnitSpecifier : byte
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Unknown | `0` | Unit is unknown and unspecified. |
| Meter | `1` | Unit is pixels-per-meter. |
